org.lemming.inputs

Class SingleOutput<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lemming.inputs.SingleOutput<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type parameter for the kind of objects that are being generated.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Source<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DAXLoader, FileLocalizer, ImageJTIFFLoader, RandomLocalizer, ScifioLoader

    public abstract class SingleOutput<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Source<T>
    This class represents a module with a single output. This typically represents a generator of objects of type T. It provides a standard implementation of the run method, which checks the output before calling newOutput in a loop while hasMoreOutputs is true.
    Author:
    Thomas Pengo, Ronny Sczech
